com.kplike.library.util

类 Fade

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.kplike.library.util.Fade

  • public class Fade
extends java.lang.Object

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器和说明
      Fade() 

    • 方法概要

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void add(android.view.View view, android.view.ViewGroup parent)
      Adds a view to the specified parent (adding it to the end of the child list in that parent, equivalent to calling addView(view)) and then fades in the view.
      void add(android.view.View view, android.view.ViewGroup parent, int index)
      Adds a view to the specified parent at the specified index in the parent's child list and then fades in the view.
      void hide(android.view.View view, int visibility)
      Fades out the specified view and then sets its visibility to the specified value (either View.INVISIBLE or View.GONE).
      void hideNaughtily(android.view.View view, int visibility)
      Fades out the specified view and then sets its visibility to the specified value (either View.INVISIBLE or View.GONE).
      void remove(android.view.View view)
      Fades out the given view and then removes in from its parent.
      void setDuration(long duration)
      All future calls to Fade operations will use this new duration value.
      void show(android.view.View view)
      Sets the visibility of the specified view to View.VISIBLE and then fades it in.

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • 构造器详细资料

      • Fade

        public Fade()

    • 方法详细资料

      • setDuration

        public void setDuration(long duration)
        All future calls to Fade operations will use this new duration value.
        参数:
        duration - The length of time, in milliseconds, that fade animations will run. This value cannot be less than zero.

      • remove

        public void remove(android.view.View view)
        Fades out the given view and then removes in from its parent. If the view is not currently parented, the method simply returns without doing anything.
        参数:
        view - The view that will be faded and removed.

      • add

        public void add(android.view.View view,
                android.view.ViewGroup parent)
        Adds a view to the specified parent (adding it to the end of the child list in that parent, equivalent to calling addView(view)) and then fades in the view. The view must not currently be parented - if its parent is not null, the method returns without doing anything.
        参数:
        view - The view to be added
        parent - The parent to which the view is added

      • add

        public void add(android.view.View view,
                android.view.ViewGroup parent,
                int index)
        Adds a view to the specified parent at the specified index in the parent's child list and then fades in the view. The view must not currently be parented - if its parent is not null, the method returns without doing anything.
        参数:
        view - The view to be added
        parent - The parent to which the view is added
        index - The index at which the view is added in the parent's child list

      • hide

        public void hide(android.view.View view,
                 int visibility)
        Fades out the specified view and then sets its visibility to the specified value (either View.INVISIBLE or View.GONE). If the view is not currently visibile, the method will return without doing anything.
        参数:
        view - The view to be hidden
        visibility - The value to which the view's visibility will be set after it fades out. Must be either View.VISIBLE or View.INVISIBLE.

      • hideNaughtily

        public void hideNaughtily(android.view.View view,
                          int visibility)
        Fades out the specified view and then sets its visibility to the specified value (either View.INVISIBLE or View.GONE). This is a naughty method as it allows you to animate from INVISIBLE - GONE or vice versa (which makes sense in some parallel universe).
        参数:
        view - The view to be hidden
        visibility - The value to which the view's visibility will be set after it fades out.

      • show

        public void show(android.view.View view)
        Sets the visibility of the specified view to View.VISIBLE and then fades it in. If the view is already visible, the method will return without doing anything.
        参数:
        view - The view to be faded in
